Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Gunther Holenstein
Reviews.Content: The resolution is fine but a little worse than the iphone 5c. It is a very fast responsive phone that I would highly recommend. But if you can shell out enough money than just go with the 5c.�

Reviews.Title: Poor Chinese engineering
Reviews.Author: jennifer cotton
Reviews.Content: This phone doesn't recognize any SIM cards installed. It's like there isn't any physical contact to the SIM. Probably poor Chinese (reverse) engineering. At least the wifi worked. Safari does not work. Wouldn't install Siri. Apple App Store is nothing but Chinese characters. Couldn't sign out of a test Chinese email.
